model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Hey, Wife, I've been thinking that we should spend more time together. How about we go on a weekend getaway?
That sounds great, husband! Where do you want to go?
Well, I was thinking of renting a cabin in the woods, away from all the hustle and bustle of the city.
Oh, that sounds like a perfect idea! It will be nice to have some peace and quiet for a change.
Yes, and we could cook our meals together, go for a hike, and just relax. What do you think?
That sounds lovely, husband. I'm really looking forward to it.
Great. I'll start looking for rental cabins right away. I know this may sound impulsive, but I'm really excited to make this happen.
Don't worry, husband, it's not impulsive. You always follow through with your plans, and I believe this will be a wonderful experience for both of us.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Personal Goals and Support', 'Related Summaries': 'Husband shares his excitement about pursuing his dreams and Wife offers her support.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Husband: I finally started taking action on my long-awaited plans today. ### Wife: That's great, honey! What goals are you working towards? ### Husband: I am really driven to achieve my dreams, and I am putting all my effort into making them a reality. ### Wife: I'm proud of you for taking steps towards making your dreams a reality. It's important to have goals and be motivated towards achieving them. ### Husband: Yes, I agree. It has taken me a while to get to this point, but I'm excited about the progress I'm making. ### Wife: I'm happy to see you so excited and motivated! Is there anything I can do to support you in this journey? ### Husband: Just your encouragement and positivity is enough for me. Knowing that you believe in me makes all the difference. ### Wife: Of course, honey. I'll always be here to support you and cheer you on. Keep pushing towards your goals and never give up. ### Husband: Thanks, love. Your support means everything to me. I'll keep working hard and chasing my dreams.' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Relationship Moments and Reflections', 'Related Summaries': 'Husband and Wife reminisce about a dance, share their feelings, and express mutual admiration.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Husband: Of course. What is it? ### Wife: A couple of years ago, you promised me that you would wait for me before leaving. But you got impatient and left without me, which disappointed me because I was counting on you. ### Husband: I'm sorry about that. I was really excited about what I was doing and I didn't think about how it would affect you. I'll make it up to you, I promise. ### Wife: Just remember that actions speak louder than words. I believe in you, but I need to know that I can count on you to keep your promises. ### Husband: I understand. You can count on me. ### Husband: I had such a great time at the dance with you. It was nice to have a break from everything and just enjoy spending time together. ### Wife: I agree, it was lovely to dance with you again. You're a great dancer. ### Husband: Thank you, I always enjoy dancing with you. It reminds me of when we first met and danced all night long. ### Wife: Yes, it was a magical night. Do you remember when we talked about your plans and dreams? ### Husband: Yeah, I do. In fact, thinking about those dreams is what inspired me to take action and start making them happen. ### Wife: I'm glad to hear that. I remember how excited you were about those plans. ### Husband: Yeah, and I'm still excited. But I also want to apologize for leaving without you that one time. I know I promised to wait for you. ### Wife: It's okay, it was a small thing. I know you're always so driven and focused on your goals. I'm just happy that we're here, dancing together. ### Husband: Me too. And speaking of being there for each other, I still can't get over how you stopped that runaway carriage. You're so brave. ### Wife: Oh, that was nothing. I just knew I had to do something to protect the people around me. ### Husband: Well, that's what makes you so special to me. You always put others first and do what needs to be done. ### Wife: And that's why I love you. You have such a big heart and you're always working towards your dreams. I'm so proud of you. ### Husband: Thanks, I couldn't do it without your love and support. You're my rock.' }
```
